product.text:
Mulan

Based on the popular 1998 Disney feature film, this boldly illustrated reprise presents the story of Mulan, a young Chinese woman who disguises herself as a man in order to take her elderly father’s place in the army and the battle against the Huns. During her journey, Mulan encounters remarkable characters who teach her important lessons in acceptance, perseverance, and self-respect.

Tie-in Activity: Engage your child in a discussion about the importance of persevering when faced with challenges. Encourage her to recall important accomplishments, such as learning to ride a bike or write her name, and discuss how she overcame obstacles along the way.
